name: Cleaning

name: Disinfection Cleaning
about_services:
HandyMama is a leading cleaning and handyman services company. We aggregate over 10,000 cleaning jobs every month at hundreds of households and workplaces.

To fight CoronaVirus, we have provided our teams with quick training, protective equipment, useful contents and other safety information so that they can best prepare themselves to prevent and fight CoronaVirus at the places they work.
